sentence.Network_en: I've had enough of this perishing job!
sentence.Network_cn: 这讨厌的差事，我真受够了！

sentence.Network_en: Let me in. I'm perishing with cold.
sentence.Network_cn: 让我进去, 我要冻死了.

sentence.Network_en: The children are always complaining that they are perishing with hunger. Don't take seriously.
sentence.Network_cn: 孩子们总抱怨他们要饿死了, 甭拿这个当回事.

entry.def: If people or animals perish, they die as a result of very harsh conditions or as the result of an accident.

example.ex: Most of the butterflies perish in the first frosts of autumn.
example.tran: 大多数蝴蝶会在秋天的第一场霜冻来临时纷纷死去。

example.ex: ...the ferry disaster in which 193 passengers perished.
example.tran: 造成193名乘客丧生的渡船事故

entry.def: If something perishes, it comes to an end or is destroyed for ever.

example.ex: Buddhism had to adapt to the new world or perish...
example.tran: 佛教必须适应新时代，否则将会消亡。

example.ex: Civilizations do eventually decline and perish.
example.tran: 各种文明最后都会衰落、消亡。

entry.def: If a substance or material perishes, it starts to fall to pieces and becomes useless.

example.ex: Obviously the plaster's just perished and all fallen off...
example.tran: 很明显灰泥已脆裂老化,全剥落下来了。
他们的车胎在慢慢老化。

entry.tran: （表示认为建议不可能、荒谬）想都别想，死了心吧，没门儿
entry.def: If someone says perish the thought, they mean that they think that a suggestion or possibility is unpleasant or ridiculous.

example.ex: Me a policeman! Perish the thought!...
example.tran: 我当警察！想都别想了，不可能！

example.ex: We don't have a computer (perish the thought) and have only recently bought an electric typewriter.
example.tran: 我们没有电脑（死了心吧），只好最近买了台电动打字机。

Sentence.sentence: More than paradise lost, a perishing rain forest could trigger a domino effect - sending winds and rains kilometers off course and loading the skies with even greater levels of greenhouse gases - that will be felt far beyond the Amazon basin.
The domino effect triggered by the perishing rain forests

means.word_mean: (饥、寒等)令人极难受的；冷极的

sentences.en: Let me in. I’m perishing with cold.
The children are always complaining that they are perishing with hunger. Don’t take seriously.
sentences.cn: 孩子们总抱怨他们要饿死了,甭拿这个当回事。
